texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Hey, hey! Kanna!

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: So, uh, about the cam I borrowed the other day...

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Cam?

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Ah, the one you took on that girls-only camping trip with Azuki? How did that go?

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Oh, it was just dandy!

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: You're giving it to Azuki for her channel, right? She's doing her own editing?

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: I wonder. I think she uploaded her first video today.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Oh! Let's watch it!

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Err, I wanted to talk about something before we watched the video.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Azuki Channel... 'Camping with the girls,' huh? Gotta be this one... Whoa!

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: What's wrong?!

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: She uploaded it today, right?! It has over three hundred thousand views!

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: For real?!

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Look!

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: It's recording?

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: You bet!

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: Aloha! Azuki here! Remember to like and subscribe, kiddos!

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Like and subscribe!

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Isn't that a bit early? Don't people usually do that at the end of the video?

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Azuki says you've gotta be a trailblazer to make it on the internet.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Really?

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: Today we bring you this! Look at this view!

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Are you sure about this? It's just a forest, isn't it?

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: Ah, shut up! A good view is a good view! Doesn't it feel good to be here?! It's about the vibe! Breathe in that clean air!

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: We sprayed so much insect spray that I can't smell anything else.

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: The hell are you here for?! To bomb my video?! You damn bitch!

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Yeah, yeah! Just let me take care of the camera! Oh, my name's Momonouchi Sumomo, by the way! I'm your camera lady today!

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: I'm a beautician by day, and I work with Azuki at filming locations. Married, by the way! So no funky business in the comments, boys!

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: No one's gonna thirst over a hag like you, geez.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Forget about me and keep the video going!

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: Yeah, yeah! Anyway, we have a talky cam today so...

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Azuki! Say it properly! Camera!

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: Who the heck cares?! God, you and the pipsqueak are such a pain in the ass sometimes!

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: So we're having a ladies-only camping trip this weekend!

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: What she said! No boys allowed!

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Oh, fire! You're totes good at camping, huh?

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: Well, naturally! I used to camp a lot back in the day. Wanted to light fires really bad, you know how it is.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Ah, I see. So it wasn't because you wanted to drive cars?

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: Cars are fun no matter what you do with them. No need to go camping for that.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Mm...

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: You got a license yet, Peach?

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Nope! Seems like a drag, so I never bothered.

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: Nah, it's easy! You can just drive an automatic and it practically drives itself.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: But what about the accelerator? Don't you gotta step on that and the breaks? You also have to turn the wheel, right?

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: And you gotta press the thing that goes all flashy when you turn, right?

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: That's the blinkers. You don't need to vocalize.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: And you also gotta turn on the thing that wipes the glass when it rains, right?

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: The wipers, yeah.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: No way! Too much stuff to do. It's not my thing.

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: You do a lot more than that fixing up someone's hair, if you ask me. You know, the whole thing where you grab someone's hair and slather butter on it.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Butter? Ah, you mean the hair wax?

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: Yeah, that thing.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: You sure you're a model, Azuki? Like, you're a top model!

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: Thanks.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: How do you not remember what hair wax is? If you keep saying stuff like that, kids are gonna start copying it! You can't spread misinformation like that!

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: Huh? You mean butter's not good for your hair?

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Are you stupid?! It'd make it sooo greasy, probably!

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: I don't think this has anything to do with camping.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Ahahah! Agreed!

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: Well, that's one fire started. Let's get cooking.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Aye! What do we roast first?

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: The bananas.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Bananas?! Excuse me?! You wanna roast bananas?!

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: They're damn good. You didn't know?

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Like hell I know! Don't we have meat or marshmallows? We're camping!

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: Pfft, that's weak sauce. You get bored of marshmallows in like, two days!

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: Bananas are forever, you broad!

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: I'll get tired of baked bananas after just one!

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: Stop being a baby about it!

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Okay, I get it! Let's roast the damn bananas, but let me roast something else too!

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: No can do. I only packed bananas.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: What?

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: Look here.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Are you a damn monkey?!

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: That was uncalled for!

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: You gotta be kidding me! How do you only bring bananas on a camping trip?!

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: What else do you need?! Besides, Japanese monkeys eat potatoes, not bananas, you airhead! We don't grow bananas here!

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Then you're worse than a monkey!

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: Ah shut up! You're just stupid! Dumb bimbo!

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Monkey!

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: Let me tell you about bananas! They don't grow here in Japan, so you gotta breed them specially or import them! They're an achievement of science! Japanese bananas are the best!

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Ahahah! The monkey's defending bananas now!

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: Well you're not getting your hands on a single one of these, you hear me?!

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: No, no! Let me have one! I'll be a monkley too! Ook ook! See?

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: Ook!

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Looks like you had fun.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: It was a blast!

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: But Azuki really needs to get real. I mean, bringing only bananas to camp out?

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Oh, this is good! Roasted bananas rock!

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: Heheh, didn't I tell you?

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: They're good, and super soft! Gimme another!

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: Who's the monkey now, eh?

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: You evolved enough to use fire! I'm loving it!

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: You still poking fun at me?!

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Another!

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: It's good, ain't it? You see it now?

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: You bet I do!

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: Bananas are all you need, right?

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Nah, I would have liked meat, still. I don't think bananas go too well with booze.

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: Damn, you got pissy when you became a housewife! Don't eat my bananas! You ought to apologize to the banana god!

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Ahahah! Who the heck is that?! You worship phallic objects now?

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: Ah, shut up! That's all you can think of when you hear about bananas?! Get your head out of the gutter!

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: It's nice to see you two fooling around like always.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: We just become little kids when we hang out together, huh?

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: I'm getting tired, Azuki! Let's switch places!

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: What? You wanna give me the cam?

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: It's not a... Whatever! Just take it!

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: You don't have to hold it up like a dummy, do you? Don't you have a tripod?

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: It's too heavy!

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: Just leave it there. It's gonna record anyway.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Thanks! Okay, let's put you on this rock. There you go.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Huh? You didn't use a tripod? Was the camera okay?

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Does this get the shot okay?

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Ah, that's cool! Now we can get me in the shot too! Hello there! Sumomo here!

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: Come over here, Peaches. Your banana's gonna get burned.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Ah, coming!

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: Ah!

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Ah! Crap... I didn't like that sound.

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: Did it break?

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Looks like that. Oh man, Kanna's gonna be so mad.

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: Ah crap! Did we lose all the footage?!

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: I think it recorded everything up until now. Can you check?

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: Sure, lemme get the computer real quick.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Just make sure you cut the part where it breaks, okay?

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: Right on!

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Damn her... I told her to cut that!

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Ah, but it did record it all.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: S-Sorry for breaking your cam...

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: The camera, you mean.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Ah, right. I'm really sorry for that, Canna...

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Kanna, you mean.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Oh, yeah...

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Just make sure you take the tripod next time. I'd like to do some banana camping too sometime.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: The roasted bananas were actually pretty good! I'll make you some to apologize, okay? I saw how Azuki made them!

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: We haven't been able to go camping lately, now that I think about it. We gotta use Hachimaru more. I mean, Azuki was kind enough to give it back and all.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Okay, let's go this weekend!

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Yippee! Good thing I broke the camera!

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Sumomo.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Ah... Sorry. Too much info, right?

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: You meant cam?

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Oh my god!
